div.div: Species-specific habitat suitability index and the amount of protected habitat in the southern boreal, middle boreal and northern boreal zones in Finland.
div.p: Variation in species-specific habitat suitability index of species (A, C, E) and the amount of protected forest, mire and marshland habitat (in km 2; B, D, F; respectively) in 2051â€“2080 according to the 19GCM ensemble mean in a forest species (the red-breasted flycatcher Ficedula parva; A, B), in a mire species (the wood sandpiper Tringa glareola: C, D) and in a marshland species (the marsh harrier Circus aeruginosus: E, F).
